channel.title: Need Help With Compiler! Please Read!
channel.description:
Hey, Well my compiler dont work basically lmao.. I think its because the Java path aint properly.. How do i change the path for java for my compiler to work?
Thanks for the help, Jake :D

@echo off
javac *.java
pause

Is that correct?

item.title: Need Help With Compiler! Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

Ok im on enviromental variable…
I get user variables for jake and system variable…

Do i use jakes as 1 and system as 2?

Thanks for the help,
Jake:D

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Compiler! Please Read!

item.title: Need Help With Compiler! Please Read!
item.dc:creator: @undertaxxx undertaxxx
item.description:
@undertaxxx wrote:

You will have to change your Enviroment variables.

Under system properties - advanced: You should see a button with Enviroment variables. (at the bottom.)

Click it.

If you’re using vista add 2 variables:

#1

name: CLASSPATH

Value: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

#2

name: PATH

Value: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;

hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Compiler! Please Read!
